(d) (i) sme exposures
I. 
The maximum credit exposure of the lending bank to an SME shall not exceed Rs. 250 million.
II. 
The annual turnover of the SME shall not exceed Rs. 750 million at the time of granting a 
facility.
III. 
Banks shall adopt an internal mechanism approved by the Board to verify the annual turnover 
of the SME. The Board approved internal mechanism shall be included in to the credit policy 
of the bank.
